DataElement.preferredDefinition: Documentation of the expiration date of the administrated or deteriorated medication or substance.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: An active natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic ingredient including endogenous body substance that is intended to furnish pharmacological activity or other direct effect in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease or to affect the structure or any function of the human body, but does not include intermediates used in the synthesis of such ingredient (21 CFR 314.3(b)).:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident._To come to a close or end of useable period; termination.:The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: An active natural, synthetic or semi-synthetic ingredient including endogenous body substance that is intended to furnish pharmacological activity or other direct effect in the diagnosis, cure, mitigation, treatment, or prevention of disease or to affect the structure or any function of the human body, but does not include intermediates used in the synthesis of such ingredient (21 CFR 314.3(b)).:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Any natural, endogenously-derived, synthetic or semi-synthetic compound with pharmacologic activity. A pharmacologic substance has one or more specific mechanism of action(s) through which it exerts one or more effect(s) on the human or animal body. They can be used to potentially prevent, diagnose, treat or relieve symptoms of a disease. Formulation specific agents and some combination agents are also classified as pharmacologic substances.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Property.preferredDefinition: To come to a close or end of useable period; termination.:The particular day, month and year an event will happen or has happened.

Concepts.definition: To come to a close or end of useable period; termination.
The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.
